pl.polsl.lab.view

Class View

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.polsl.lab.view.View
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MenuView, SortView

    public abstract class View
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class for view that is responsible of GUI and retrieving user's interaction with it.
